website_summaries.verdict: Two popular drugstore brands team up for this foundation formulated especially for mature skin.
pros: Offers light to medium coverage and helps reduce the appearance of fine lines
Easy to apply and helps moisturize and firm skin
cons: Texture is a bit thick and only available in 12 shades

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking coverage
customer_reviews.text: Best reasonably priced foundation I've tried. At 60, I never expected to look like the models for this product, but it does minimize the fine lines and minor wrinkles. Goes on smoothly and looks very natural. Does a good job of covering age spots and freckles without looking heavy. Best aspect for me is that it is fragrance-free. I am super sensitive and this product does not bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: retromadre

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coverage and feel!
customer_reviews.text: The price was awesome. I thought I was getting only one bottle but there were two. I’m 60 years old and to date I have not found a foundation that I could actually wear without powder. That is until now. I love the coverage and the feeling of this foundation and it makes your skin look flawless. 5 thumbs up on this find.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Good makeup
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I can buy this makeup on Amazon since we live in a small town and unless I catch a sale in a larger town, it is more expensive. I really like this makeup and the color is pretty neutral. We live in a dry area so I use a lot of moisturizer. Therefore, this makeup goes on smoothly. I'm 71.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick to apply.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Cover girl products for years, this particular one is for aging, thought I would give it a try, being over 70 I no longer use a lot of makeup. This gives me just enough cover, aging spots and etc. Plus the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great base before applying your foundation. I apply sunscreen then this product and then my foundation. It makes it last longer and look smooth all day long!! Great for sensitive skin. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Harmony A.Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Discover wrinkles you didn't know were there. 👎👎🚫
customer_reviews.text: Ugh! I discovered wrinkles I didn't know were there. I thought this would be great. I love the Olay Regenerist products. So I thought what could be better than Olay in a foundation? Well lots of things apparently. This product is awful. I prefer a more natural look. Not possible with this heavy makeup. Wearing this made me a wrinkly pancake faced old woman. I'll stick with Almay.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn J.

customer_reviews.title: Enhanced wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: This product felt great and I wanted to love it but it enhanced every fine line and wrinkle that I have and made me look much older.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It goes on like a lightweight lotion and dries/absorbs in really fast. I use high end primers but this is my new favorite. It doesn't leave that greasy silicone-like feel to my face like other primers. Also keeps my makeup lasting all day. Definitely a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse89

customer_reviews.title: Someone must have returned this a few times...
customer_reviews.text: But I’m not. Throwing it right in the trash so it can’t happen to anyone else. The sticker was poorly, but already removed on the foundation, and the primer didn’t even come with the top. Label looks nice Aunt Nancy printed them for whatever Target returns clerk that took them home to re sell. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Grabis

customer_reviews.title: Kind of thick....good if that's what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I didn't like this too much because I'm more accustomed to a BB cream. It's kind of thick & heavy. Settles into fine lines & wrinkles & makes them more visible. Probably fine if you have NO wrinkles & lovely skin to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: LikelyOsprey472

customer_reviews.title: Not enough coverage
customer_reviews.text: I am middle aged and have some lines and dark spots on my face. When I first started using the CoverGirl + Olay Simply Ageless liquid foundation, I really liked it. It is smooth and creamy, and does not accentuate the lines and creases like some heavier foundations do. However, I came to realize that it is too light of coverage; it does not help hide any flaws, like uneven skin tone. I understand that concealers can be used in addition to foundation, but I do expect my foundation to make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Connie P

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am 54 years old and have tried just about every make up brand and product out there. Of course, some of the more expensive products have worked really well but this product is just as good! It goes on creamy and smooth and blends beautifully. It helps camouflage imperfections and I even use it down on my neck where it helps cover wrinkles. I highly recommend this product!’
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Pippin

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.text: It applies and covers my 77 year old skin nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and flawless!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this make up for about a year now and I love it!! First time using the primer...so excited to try it!! Makes you look flawless!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’m a life-long powder wearer. But, now that I’m in my 30s my face seems slightly older and I was starting to cringe and close up photos. I bought this to try and I’m glad I did. It’s not too heavy, it’s mixed with a lotion in the bottle and hydrated while drying without that heavy feeling. It just feels like lotion going on. I’ve been wearing it under my powder for a few weeks now and I’ve received a ton of compliments about how I look. People are saying I look refreshed, that I’m glowing, that I look radiant, etc.. but all I’ve done different is added in this makeup. Guess I should have started years ago
customer_reviews.author: SharonGill2357

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this foundation. I've tried all sorts, and aside from a foundation that perfectly matches my skin (I'm Irish- it's hard to find something lighter than alabaster) I prefer this one. As skin ages, primers can end up making pores and wrinkles MORE defined rather than less. This foundation is fairly heavily pigmented, so my skin ends up feeling smoother, softer, and the wrinkles and pores far less defined than with other products. Has SPF, which I always have to have on (my other color is lobster- there is no in between.) Bonus- despite the fact that it's heavily pigmented, it does not feel heavy on the face. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Pederson

customer_reviews.title: I don't like wearing makeup
customer_reviews.text: I don't like wearing makeup; but, age dictates I do, so I don't scare small children. I suppose, if I have to wear it, this stuff is tolerable. Goes on lightly and evenly (I use foam sponge) and it doesn't come off until I wash it off. One reason I've never liked wearing liquid makeup is that it would rub off easily onto collars. Not this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: PithyWoman

customer_reviews.title: What changed?!?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for YEARS and love it! But... something has changed. Not only did the product I received not feel the same, but it smelled, for lack of a better word... porky, like pig porky. I returned it, and bought another from my local Walgreens. It also smelled unbearably porky, like hot and rotten pig. Yeah, so, darn it. I’m searching for a new brand. There’s no way I can have that smell ON my face. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: J. Haskins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Best primer I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup primer. I’ve used many expensive brands in the past and have been left disappointed, so honestly I just tried this one because the price was right. Much to my delight this stuff really works! I’ve noticed a lot less creasing under my eyes especially! I have very sensitive skin and have has no negative reactions. I will definitely buy this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: MicheleT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shade
customer_reviews.text: I have porcelain skin; finding the perfect match is challenging and frustrating, and I typically struggle with it. I use Covergirl, so I had an idea about what shade should suit me. So glad I went with the Ivory - it's perfect, covers well (just 1 pump), smells great, and doesn't cause acne. I stopped using foundation all together. Happy. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AprilBebeGurl

customer_reviews.title: Bottle lid missing when received
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smooth and does what it's supposed to do. so no complaints there. haven't really used it that long to say anything about it's "anti-aging" claim, all I really wanted is a primer for my foundation and it works for that. My only beef is that whoever packaged it did not do a good job. It was missing its lid and bottle was not sealed. So maybe I've been applying arsenic or whatever on my face all this time. Guess I'll never know, I used it anyway. live life on the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Not great stand-alone coverage, but is a good primer.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am not impressed with it for what I was hoping it would function as. I was hoping it would offer actual coverage but it doesn't really... so i put my mineral makeup on top of it and that looks pretty great. So, like I saw a couple other reviews indicate, this is a great primer. But alone I don't think it is good. So, 4 stars because I feel like other foundations provide more coverage, but also this does feel really great and light on the skin, and is in fact a nice primer.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia B

customer_reviews.title: I love this foundation!
customer_reviews.text: Going on 50 here. Fine lines and dark circles and uneven skin tone are now a thing. Not awful, just needs mitigating. I read every review first. I've been using Clinique and/or Bare Minerals for years. I'll never spend that extra money again. This provides such smooth, even coverage with just the tiniest amounts (Indont wea
customer_reviews.author: TeamMom

customer_reviews.title: Product great bottle, not so much
customer_reviews.text: The pumping action in this bottle fizzles out way before the product. I have at least half of the product that won't come out due to the pumping device in the bottle, what a waste. Considering it takes me quite a while to use up a bottle, I no longer can return it. I love the makeup but it is useless to me if I cannot get it out of the bottle!! I hope someone will take notice and correct the issue, otherwise I will have to try another product. Not a happy camper
customer_reviews.author: Evieg

customer_reviews.title: Expired product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the variety pack that included the compact with sunscreen and the liquid versions. The compact product with SPF 28 expires JN20 (see photo). Whether or not this means January or June, it's June 2020 already so I'm returning the product. I cannot really comment on the overall performance of either product since they were sold as a set, and, although I tested them both for color match (which was spot on), I have to return them both.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Soft and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been on the hunt for a great foundation that doesn’t make me look orange. I’ve found it! I’m not using this for the “ageless” factor as I’m 27. However, I love how lightweight and moisturizing this is. It doesn’t look cakey and settle into my pores, yet has a good amount of coverage. My other favorite foundation is L’Oréal Infallible Pro Matte, as a comparison. The problem with that one was I couldn’t find the right shade. I’m light-medium with neutral undertones and bought classic ivory. It’s a good match for tone. Might be slightly light, but will work in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I was instantly happy with it and that rarely happens. I've been using the jar formula but it seemed a little too heavy for me. This is lightweight, evened my skin tone beautifully, and goes on like a dream with my beauty blender! I'm 53 with light skin and the 210 Classic Ivory is perfect. It looks really smooth on my skin! I will never buy anything else now!
customer_reviews.author: deni_b

customer_reviews.title: None
customer_reviews.text: Best price I've found anywhere. I've been wearing creamy beige for 50 years. This one is for seniors. I love it. It goes on smooth and I don't have a caked on look. I may be old in years but I'm young at heart and will always try to look my best. Cover Girl has us seniors covered. I tried Revlon, Clinique, etc., but always come back to CG. Who doesn't want a great deal? You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this primer for a long time, under the foundation made by the same company. Since my skin is somewhat dry, using this primer helps the foundation go on more smoothly; also, the foundation doesn't cake up on my skin as soon as it does without the primer.
customer_reviews.author: A. R.

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD PRODUCT FOR A REASONABLE PRICE.
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT SEEMS TO BE WORKING WELL, AND IT DOES WHAT I HAD HOPED. IT COVERS MY ROSACEA WHICH IS WHAT I WAS HNOPING IT WOULD DO, PLUS SEEMS TO FILL IN SOME TINY SMILE LINES THAT BOTHER ME. A GOOD ITEM FOR A REASONABLE PRICE COMPARED TO OTHERS. AND I LOVE THE PUMP TOP TOO AS YOUR FINGERS DON'T GET INTO A BOTTLE TO CONTAMINATE IT. I USE A NEW FOAM APPLICATOR WEDGE EVERY COUPLE OF DAYS AND THAT WORKS VERY WELL WITH THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Ordering things online isn’t always the best way to get the color you want so I ...
customer_reviews.text: As far as staying on all day it definitely does do that. Ordering things online isn’t always the best way to get the color you want so I probably should have ordered something more in the peach department but I love the lipstick it does stay on thank you
customer_reviews.author: Pamela G.

customer_reviews.title: Light and smooth
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I think it works better than the other foundations I’ve tried from cover girl. I’v been using cover girl for over ten years. I used this ageless moisturizing one this year and I think it works great. Goes on smoothly and leaves a natural looking finish. I even use this for slight cover up like under eyes or a quick fix for running around and i get so many compliments on how young I look. Little do they know I am actually wearing cover girl foundation! Thank you cover girl!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Romero

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product, I ordered classic ivory and it matches my face skin tone perfectly. Very soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie London

customer_reviews.title: Another great Cover Girl foundation.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Cover Girl foundations for years, and their Creamy Natural is perfect on me most of the year (unless I'm a bad girl and forget to use my facial sunscreen). As I've aged, I've worked my way up through their products to this one, and I love it. My face just looks natural and even, not made up. There's nothing worse than heavy makeup face on a 50+ woman. You don't want to look like you're trying too hard. This foundation is perfect--natural, blends well, creamy, doesn't take a lot to do the job. It even covers my freckles (which, TBH, I don't necessarily want to do!).
customer_reviews.author: Dr W

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup ever wont go back to old makeup ever again
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup!! I will not ever go back to my old makeup ever again. I’m 39 years old and have a few wrinkle lines but this makeup works really good on them and doesn’t show them very much at all. If you haven’t tried this your missing out. I’m very fair complexion so I ordered classic ivory then I put on coty airspun loose face powder(translucent) just gives me a bit more of a dry face because I don’t like oily makeup in any brand. Try it you’ll love it
customer_reviews.author: Care Bear

customer_reviews.title: Skin is so smooth!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mother. She had a bottle and couldn’t find it in Walmart last week. She’s 82 years old and I was surprised at how smooth her gave looked with this. Her skin is fairly smooth already but this makeup made her skin look like a natural soft color. It almost looked like her face had been “touched up” like a photo. It was beautiful! I’m going to buy some in my shade now.
customer_reviews.author: Banditgirl222

customer_reviews.title: This makes your skin better over time
customer_reviews.text: I use to cover alot of red spot on my face as I reach 56, After using this for a few weeks, I noticed my skin is much less red. It's making my skin even out, which is fantastic. I actually LOVE putting this on as it covers any tiredness under my eyes. The tone is perfect for my light complection. I will never use any other brand because, "if it's not broke, don't fix it." Thank you CoverGirl/Olay for teaming up and making this awesome foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the reviews I read about it minimizing pores. I did not find that to be true. I will say that it does make your foundation stay on and wear better throughout the day. It is easy to apply with a makeup sponge. It comes out white but blends into the skin with no tint of any color at all. So it's ok for your foundation longevity throughout the day but does zero on blurring or minimizing or hiding pores.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Probably a knock off
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, have been using it for years. However, the last few orders received from Amazon have had a terrible, weird smell to them, so I think they might be knock offs. I find this very unfortunate, because I really liked buying unopened products, whereas if you buy it in the store it often has been sampled.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bach

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice on, but not full coverage
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this makeup feels on my face, but unfortunately it doesn't provide the full coverage I need. I'm in my 50s, so was looking for something with moisture, but I can still see redness and blotches through it as soon as I put it on. It could be great for someone with blemish-free skin, though, as it blends in well and feels nice. I think it's a good quality product, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and Smoothing
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product on a whim after seeing all the excellent reviews it had. I have never heard of it before, but saw it was recommended for aging, sensitive skin and decided I needed to try it out before repurchasing my old pricier primer that I don't totally love. I am so pleasantly surprised at how well this keeps my makeup on my face throughout the day, and smooths my uneven skin to give me a nice smooth canvas for my makeup. I also love that it doesn't break me out!! This is a new fave!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately I got the old packaging, which was showing when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately I got the old packaging product which is what was showing when I purchased it. It is exactly the same shade as what I had. Just an FYI: I had purchased the same 205 item in the new packaging in town. I believe 205, what I had, was the lightest in that particular line. That product is not even close to being the same shade I had. The new packaging 205 product was much lighter. So went immediately to Amazon and was lucky to find the old packaging there. I don't know why or what the difference is in the shades, but I am very fair and the new packaging product 205 made me look dead.
customer_reviews.author: the sewist

customer_reviews.title: I was not happy with this primer
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with this primer. It did not leave my skin smooth so that I could apply my foundation. Would not buy again. Wish I could return it. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: V L Poissant

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long! :(
customer_reviews.text: I have VERY dry fair skin. And I will say the shade was perfect! But that's all the good I can say about it It smells weird, its breaks me out within hours of wearing it. And at first it sits beautifully on the skin but with in an hour, it cracks and clings to any imperfections and dry skin. The Covergirl Trublend Hydrating Foundation is 100x better than this, but its ivory is just too dark for my skin tone. I was wearing the Maybelline Fitme for dry skin but I was looking for something next level. Looks like I'm going to have to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best foundations I ever have gotten I’m 47 and the age crap fine lines and dark marks this is light weight and comfortable also makes skin not look all dried out or cakey I also use primer and Olay product every night which help but I’m saying that this is a great mixture for my skin and routine
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Rebecca Confer

customer_reviews.title: Blends well but leaves face oily
customer_reviews.text: It does blend well into my skin and feels like I'm wearing nothing. BUT it makes my tzone SO oily it's not worth buying again. I used cover girl Tru blend for years with no issues and thought I'd try this one since I'm in my 30s now. But absolutely will not be buying again. So so oily. Face feels completely disgusting by end of day.
customer_reviews.author: melinator85

customer_reviews.title: STINKS!  Literally!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to write a review for the product, itself, when the product stinks like old cigarette smoke. It's a hard smell to describe, but it isn't something you want to smear on your face. There does not appear to be an expiration date on the package, so I can't tell if it's expired or not, but I am definitely going to have to throw it away, as it stinks like nastiness.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation. It works well if you have mature skin. I have some dry spots and it doesn't accentuate them at all. It goes on smooth and lasts a long time. I recently tried it with a makeup brush and it worked even better! It covers dark spots well and is moisturizing. I've tried more expensive breaks and always come back to this.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using whipped concealer for the past few years, so I was a little concerned about the coverage of a liquid foundation. I'm pleasantly surprised with the coverage and how light weight this is. My whipped concealer settled into my fine lines after a few hours of applying it. This stays in place and lasts all day long. I also love that this foundation has Oil of Olay right in it, so I know I'm using a product that will help fight the signs of aging.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Frein/Betty Frein

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this foundation!! It stays on all day and is very creamy and smooth. Does not transfer even to my mask which is white inside. I had been paying $47 per 1 oz bottle of liquid foundation from a department store. Never again!!! This stuff is wonderful! Covers sooo well and I’m 69 years old.
customer_reviews.author: SharonW

customer_reviews.title: Not hypoallergenic
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when I found this product because it was for older , more sensative skin and fragrance free. As soon as I applied it my eyes started tearing up and were irritated all day. Same thing happened with the concealor. I went on day with just concealir to see if it would bother me and it did. I tried another day with just the foundation and that also bothered me . Neither of these products have an expiration date on them . They might be old
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: I have normal skin and I'm in my mind forties. I've tried expensive and drug store primers. This is the best. My makeup lasts most of the day, if I set my makeup it lasts all day. Also it blurred fine lines and my pores.
customer_reviews.author: A Riley

customer_reviews.title: Covergirl & Olay Ageless Makeup Primer
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have been using this product for a long time and love it! I put it on my face every morning before I put the corresponding foundation on. It moistures great and has made my skin look great! I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: K. Zander

customer_reviews.title: Love this primer!
customer_reviews.text: This primer works great! I had been using a clear pore-minimizing primer previously which didn’t make my skin fell great. This is a creamy lotion type primer that goes on smooth like lotion (I still apply a moisturizer first, then the primer because it isn’t very moisturizing and absorbs fast). It felt greasy/thick at first but completely absorbs and makes my face feel “primed” and even and smooth. Doesn’t look/feel greasy afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: AJD

customer_reviews.title: This is the one! Best!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this - takes a little use to get to the part where both moisturizer and base come out (at first only base comes out) and it feels so different and so much better when you get to that point on the product - fast delivery - bummer that product wasn’t sealed - tried almost every expensive designer brand comparable product and I always go back to this one. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Frugalladytoo

customer_reviews.title: Great price, but not as smooth
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had seen a photo of this “white liquid” foundation. I admit I probably would not have bought it. Reason is my previous makeup foundation was a “silky clear” foundation. This product goes on smooth but dries out quicker before I put on my makeup. I remedied that by adding another layer of foundation. It is a great price and it does the job. For these two reasons, I will finish this product before I return to my original product.
customer_reviews.author: RosaC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Didn't care for this foundation at all. Feels to heavy and dry on the face. I'm upset because I always read the reviews before purchasing and most of them hyped this foundation up. To me it is horrible, so I just wasted $13.00 on something I can't use. The cheaper brand I've been using is way better. Do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kay

customer_reviews.title: Not A Good Product!  Buy Something Else!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the worst product I have ever put on my face. It was so dry it showed every line on my face and then some I didn't know I had. The next time I tried it, I used a moisturizer first...not much better. I'm going back to Olay Total Effects 7 in One...it minimizers facial lines. I have been buying from Amazon for years and this is the second bad rating I've given.
customer_reviews.author: Semmie

customer_reviews.title: No way for me to return to Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Fair Ivory because it was the only one that they would let me purchase. It is horrible. It is so white!! And I am pale! Wearing it makes me look like Casper the Friendly Ghost. I hate it and want to return it but Amazon's return button is not working! Is there anyone who can help?
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Hope you don't have lines under your eyes
customer_reviews.text: I find this to be more like a lotion it doesn't stop the foundation that goes with it from slipping or any other Foundation it doesn't help with fine lines it just moisturizes that's it not sure if it even helps with aging as I've seen no difference and I've been using it for a month or so. Put on the pros it does moisturize and give your face a silky feel and I do wear it alone with just eyeliner and a little bit of powder.
customer_reviews.author: Shade989

customer_reviews.title: scent was pleasant but that was pretty much it.
customer_reviews.text: mine came wrapped in a wrinkled plastic bag, no lid, looked like it had already been used. the texture was greasy and it didnt soak into the skin. it also left dry patches.
customer_reviews.author: Salem

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what it's supposed to do LOL have a hard time keeping it in place even with a setting spray. May work better for others has decent coverage and doesn't feel oily. I just don't care for the consistency nor the tone of the one I got. I feel for stars is fair for the slippage on the sides of my nose
customer_reviews.author: Shade989

customer_reviews.title: I would not suggest for dry skin or older women.
customer_reviews.text: The color is not what it portrays. I wear medium beige and this is a very bad cream. WOW! I feel like I have a mask on my face. Too heavy and shows lines. Not a great look.
customer_reviews.author: TkY

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom (88years old and still looking good). She really cares about her appearance and is very pleased with this foundation. The built in moisturizer helps tremendously with smooth and even application. I’ll be buying some for myself too!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Toolin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT primer!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best primer I have ever used. It does not irritate my sensitive, acne-ptone skin and greatly improved the wear of my foundation. Smooth, soft, wonderful! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: freedom girl

customer_reviews.title: Gives great coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Like this product. Very good for older skin. I apply it with a foundation brush and it covers my age spots and pores. I wouldn't say it's light weight because, for me, it provides full coverage. Been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me but seems to work for others.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s just me but I did not like this at all. I wanted to but it didn’t work for me. It’s definitely moisturizing and on the thicker side, however, it didn’t blend into my skin. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: TMC

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and feel. Lasts!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have found this years ago. I apply this with a silicone makeup "sponge ". It goes on so smooth with great coverage. It doesn't settle in my fine laugh lines. Looks flawless and healthy and holds up all day through multiple jobs. My skin feels smoother and healthier after using it for a couple of weeks now. Definitely will continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is more like a lotion than a primer. It doesn't leave a matte finish and it makes my skin look oily--opposite of what it's supposed to do. Also, my foundation (liquid) seems to blend with it rather than sit on top of it, in such a way that my foundation looks blotchy and uneven. It's like it thins the foundation out or something. I'm going back to Revlon Photofinish.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the face
customer_reviews.text: I am older and it is more difficult to get a shade that won't highlight wrinkles caused by age. I got this in a dark color and put a bit in the palm of my hand and mixed it with a little lighter and got the perfect color for my face. I love it! One of the things I do which you might think silly is I apply at night before bed and let it settle overnight due to my age then it looks natural in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Really like this foundation
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is light and goes on smoothly. Color was perfect for me. I am in my 60s and have sensitive skin. This does not break me out and feels like I am not wearing makeup. Only takes a small amount to get coverage. Will buy again. Bought one for my mother and she also likes it.
customer_reviews.author: debbie700

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This says that it is full coverage, but it isn’t, it’s medium coverage. But it is buildable. It feels really good on the skin. I did use the primer that comes with it. Really the only thing I noticed is that it did settle into my smile lines an hour or two after wearing it, but all of my foundations do that. Other than that, it lasted until I washed it off, which was about 12 hours later. It didn’t make me look cakey or anything. Overall I really like this product
customer_reviews.author: Necia

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't rub off on a face mask!
customer_reviews.text: At aged 68 I still want to look polished! This foundation, along with the primer, goes on smoothly, stays fresh looking all day, adds brightness to may skin, AND does not end up smearing the inside my face mask! A winning combination!
customer_reviews.author: ClassicalGirl

customer_reviews.title: Started to smell
customer_reviews.text: Toward the end of the bottle (probably had 1/4 left), it started to smell like.... feet? That’s the best I can describe it. It went from smelling great to smelling awful, I didn’t want to wear it and have someone think I didn’t shower. Bought one from target and I didn’t have that problem, wish I could buy it on amazon with the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORST MAKEUP EVER
customer_reviews.text: I would never buy this again it's suppose to lessen age look well let me be the first to tell you. It actually adds years to your face. Not just me my young daughter's to. It almost acts like it add lines and wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product IS AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This product is FABULOUS!! Covers well w/o heavy makeup feel... all blemishes DISAPPEAR & it looks SO NATURAL’ I use to use the disk version but this smoothed on easier and better. Helps you look more than 10 years younger plus it offers Hyuronic acid and other good peptides
customer_reviews.author: Tea lover

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for awhile. I usually get it at the big box store, and I was happy to see it here on Amazon. I love it. It goes on smoothly, doesn't take much, doesn't get all cakey, and has great coverage. I also like that it's a pump dispenser that allows me to see how much is left in the bottle. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy S

customer_reviews.title: This is great
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure I was ready to change to a new foundation, but I’m so glad i branched ouy and tried this! I have normal to oily skin and it sat nicely on my face. Because if the olay in it, there was a sort of slip feel to it but not in a oily way. It felt like it was hydrating the dryer parts of my skin, and controlling oil where I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got 1 shade lighter than what I needed (or am used too) but no biggie that's my fault. The product itself is nice...a tad thick compared to my usual product but applied smoothly. Smells nice but not overpowering. Very nice finish and I am not oily or caked up at the end of a long shift. Will buy again in a different shade next time
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Fetrow

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I don't have any complaints
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I don't have any complaints. Very easy to apply and I recommend it for the girls that like to apply their makeup quick and don't want full coverage. Reminds me of using bb cream. It blends in well with my skin and stays on throughout the day, I don't think this would work with oily skin though. For the price, it comes with a lot of product. Would definitely recommend for anyone on the go :)
customer_reviews.author: Ter

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cheap drugstore make up you can get in my opinion.. I try to use my expensive foundation judiciously since it cost $75 for 1 ounce, so on just normal weekdays this is a great around the house and neighborhood make up. Looks great, where’s well and doesn’t settle into lines of mature skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Foundation
customer_reviews.text: Amazing coverage ! I have been thru so many foundations, expensive and cheap foundations. This one is by far the best one i have tried! I am happy to finally say that i found my perfect foundation. My skin is oily and breaks out fast and this foundation sets everything perfect. My face finally doesn't look oily while wearing foundation!
customer_reviews.author: LizGC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful under foundation
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a primer before but I love how this makes my foundation look so much better on my skin, diminishing any texture on my 48 yr old face. It feels silky, smooth and moisturizing and gives a beautiful finish to whatever foundation I use
customer_reviews.author: Amy Trumbull

customer_reviews.title: Love this Foundation!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think I have finally found the foundation for ME! Applies very smooth, no prior moisturizer needed. So it’s saves time and money!!!! It provides coverage perfectly !!! I’m impressed!! Highly recommend to those of us 50+years old and fine lines beginning to show!!
customer_reviews.author: dogmomof7

customer_reviews.title: No seal
customer_reviews.text: There bottle was not sealed, so I didn't try it. Concerning.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla J

customer_reviews.title: Funky smell
customer_reviews.text: This stuff covers alright but it smells super weird. I dread putting it on because of the gross, sort of sweet smell it gives off. The pigmentation is fine and the coverage is good but I probably won't buy it again because of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jess E

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this is real-no lid
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with no lid, no box. It makes me uncomfortable to use this product. I keep wondering if it is a fake. It also doesn’t say if it has a spf. I ordered it assuming it did.
customer_reviews.author: Henny Penny

customer_reviews.title: There is a lot of product in this little bottle
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this I thought there wasn't much product for the price. I like the light coverage so bought a replacement bottle 2 months ago thinking I was almost out and the first bottle is still going strong. There is no shaking needed and the texture feels somewhat whipped. It feels light on the face and doesn't settle into lines like some foundation can.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: It may not be hollywood style make up but for the price I found it pleasant. It went on smoothly without lots of clumping or line filling. The color was even. The scent is not heavy. I did not need to use a lot. I don't know that it was great at moisturizing but I didn't find it to be drying.
customer_reviews.author: Tom and Johanna Young

customer_reviews.title: Feel like Heavy Coverage and Barely Give you Light
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the smell or quality. I personally only like light coverage foundation for minor color correction on my face. This foundation failed to give me a proper light coverage look that lasted more than an hour. To make it worse, it feels like you're wearing heavy coverage foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Oedhel

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: I have tried lots of foundations; but for my 80 year old face this is the BEST
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: smooth
customer_reviews.text: i am no expert in applying make-up, but apparently in using this, one does not have to be. i use moisturizer, let it dry a moment, add this, and then add foundation. the result (for me) is a very smooth and natural appearance. i recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well - Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the extra staying power that this product gives my foundation makeup. I have very sensitive skin and this product actually works for me. I could not tell any difference in the moisture of my skin because I also use a moisturizer. Great product. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: It works, makeup stays in place.
customer_reviews.text: Once I put it on in the morning it lasts me pretty much the whole day. I have to set it with translucent powder in the summer time to help absorb perspiration when it's humid but not much. My skin looks fresh, younger, and good. Thanks Cover girl and Play! Excellent merger on products!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis F. Venkataya

customer_reviews.title: First makeup I’ve ever really liked
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually wears makeup but now that I’m 50 I’m looking for a little something to make me feel more confident and this stuff is great. I use it to cover my rosacea on my cheeks and circles under my eyes. Great coverage but still feels very lightweight. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Big time reader

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation
customer_reviews.text: Love this foundation for everyday wear. This shade was a little dark for my skin color but i blended in with the lighter shade and it works well. It about blending in the lighter foundation on the outer part of the face near neckline and then this darker shade on my inner face. Anyway, it’s an inexpensive foundation that does the job!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Usually great product..  Smelled off the last two purchases..
customer_reviews.text: I usually use this brand quite a bit bit the last two times that I ordered, they have smelt a little off.. Like corn chips or mousy like.... Both times were different colors..
customer_reviews.author: Stacey M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This makeup is awful. Clumpy and weird texture not smooth at all. Made me break out terribly too and I never break out.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful primer!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this feels on my skin. Feels more like skincare than makeup. Keeps my makeup in place and smoothed my face for application. I really like it. I hate the slippery type primers so this is perfect. I’m 35 and combo skin and it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MouthyMama

customer_reviews.title: No cap on makeup
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup and order it all the time BUT this time it arrived on time but the lid was off and some of the makeup was on other items in box.I don't like getting things that are open. Makes me think this was used by someone?
customer_reviews.author: lady

product_meta.title: Covergirl & Olay Simply Ageless 3-in-1 Liquid Foundation, Creamy Natural
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Foundation| Color:CREAMY NATURAL| Size:Pack of 1Give your skin that youthful glow with Covergirl & Olay Simply Ageless 3-in-1 Liquid Foundation. This anti-aging foundation plumps up skin to instantly reduce the appearance of wrinkles for a younger-looking complexion. Skin tone looks more even and other imperfections are blurred, while hyaluronic complex and vitamin C deliver firming hydration to keep your skin looking healthy and radiant. Pro-tip: Use with Covergirl Simply Ageless Anti-Aging Foundation Primer for maximum results.

BRAND STORY
By CoverGirl
feature_bullets: REDUCES WRINKLES: Anti-aging foundation instantly reduces the look of wrinkles for a smoother, more youthful appearance
IMPROVES TONE: Evens skin tone and blurs the appearance of dark circles and other less-than-perfect areas
HYDRATING FORMULA: Contains hyaluronic complex and vitamin C for firmer and healthier-looking skin
FIND YOUR SHADE: Available in multiple shades so you can find the right match for your skin tone
CRUELTY-FREE: Covergirl products are Leaping Bunny Certified by Cruelty-Free International, meaning they are never tested on animals

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
